00015 namespace Engine
00016 {
00017         class __IMPORTEXPORT Texture
00018         {
00019                 friend class CTilemap;
00020         public:
00021                 Texture() : textureID(-1), loaded(false), imageData(0) {}
00022                 ~Texture();
00023 
00024                 //create a texture out of pre-loaded image data, width and height, to add support for other filetypes
00025                 bool createTexture(const unsigned char * imageData, short width, short height, char cBits);
00026 
00027                 //load a Targa (.TGA) bitmap and use it as a texture
00028                 bool loadTexture(const char * path);
00029 
00030                 int getTextureID() { return textureID; }
00031                 void select() { glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, textureID); }
00032 
00033                 short getWidth() { return width; }
00034                 short getHeight() { return height; }
00035 
00036                 const unsigned char * getTextureData() {return imageData;}
00037 
00038         private:
00039                 unsigned int textureID;
00040                 short width;
00041                 short height;
00042                 char bits;
00043                 char * filename;        //for checking for double textures
00044                 bool loaded;
00045                 unsigned char * imageData;      //image data (stored in case it is needed for stuff like collision detection)
00046         };
00047 }
